verses.verse: Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was old <S%H2204><s%> and well stricken <S%H935><s%> in years <S%H3117><s%>; and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H2204><s%>, Thou art old and well stricken <S%H935><s%> in years <S%H3117><s%>, and there remaineth <S%H7604><s%> yet very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to be possessed <S%H3423><s%>.
This is the land <S%H776><s%> that yet remaineth <S%H7604><s%>: all the regions <S%H1552><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and all the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%>;

from the Shihor <S%H7883><s%>, which is before <S%H6440><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, even unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of Ekron <S%H6138><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>, which is reckoned <S%H2803><s%> to the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>; the five <S%H2568><s%> lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>; the Gazites <S%H5841><s%>, and the Ashdodites <S%H796><s%>, the Ashkelonites <S%H832><s%>, the Gittites <S%H1663><s%>, and the Ekronites <S%H6139><s%>; also the Avvim <S%H5761><s%>,

on the south <S%H8486><s%>; all the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, and Mearah <S%H4632><s%> that belongeth to the Sidonians <S%H6722><s%>, unto Aphek <S%H663><s%>, to the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>;

and the land <S%H776><s%> of the Gebalites <S%H1382><s%>, and all Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%>, from Baal-gad <S%H1171><s%> under mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%> unto the entrance <S%H935><s%> of Hamath <S%H2574><s%>;

all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> from Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> unto Misrephoth-maim <S%H4956><s%>, even all the Sidonians <S%H6722><s%>; them will I drive out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: only allot <S%H5307><s%> thou it unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as I have commanded thee <S%H6680><s%>.

Now therefore divide <S%H2505><s%> this land <S%H776><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto the nine <S%H8672><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%>, and the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>.

With him the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H5676><s%>, beyond the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>, even as Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> gave them <S%H5414><s%>:

from Aroer <S%H6177><s%>, that is on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon <S%H769><s%>, and the city <S%H5892><s%> that is in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%>, and all the plain <S%H4334><s%> of Medeba <S%H4311><s%> unto Dibon <S%H1769><s%>;

and all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, who reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>;

and Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%> and Maacathites <S%H4602><s%>, and all mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%>, and all Bashan <S%H1316><s%> unto Salecah <S%H5548><s%>;

all the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, who reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%> and in Edrei <S%H154><s%> (the same was left <S%H7604><s%> of the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of the Rephaim <S%H7497><s%>); for these did Moses <S%H4872><s%> smite <S%H5221><s%>, and drove them out <S%H3423><s%>.

Nevertheless the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> drove <S%H3423><s%> not out the Geshurites <S%H1651><s%>, nor the Maacathites <S%H4602><s%>: but Geshur <S%H1651><s%> and Maacath <S%H4602><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Only unto the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> no inheritance <S%H5159><s%>; the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, made by fire <S%H801><s%> are his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as he spake unto him <S%H1696><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

And their border <S%H1366><s%> was from Aroer <S%H6177><s%>, that is on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> of the Arnon <S%H769><s%>, and the city <S%H5892><s%> that is in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%>, and all the plain <S%H4334><s%> by Medeba <S%H4311><s%>;
Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and all its cities <S%H5892><s%> that are in the plain <S%H4334><s%>; Dibon <S%H1769><s%>, and Bamoth-baal <S%H1120><s%>, and Beth-baal <S%H1010><s%>-meon,
and Jahaz <S%H3096><s%>, and Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%>, and Mephaath <S%H4158><s%>,
and Kiriathaim <S%H7156><s%>, and Sibmah <S%H7643><s%>, and Zereth-shahar <S%H6890><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%>,
and Beth-peor <S%H1047><s%>, and the slopes of Pisgah <S%H798><s%>, and Beth-jeshimoth <S%H1020><s%>,

and all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain <S%H4334><s%>, and all the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, who reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> with the chiefs <S%H5387><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>, Evi <S%H189><s%>, and Rekem <S%H7552><s%>, and Zur <S%H6698><s%>, and Hur <S%H2354><s%>, and Reba <S%H7254><s%>, the princes <S%H5257><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%>, that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

Balaam <S%H1109><s%> also the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%>, the soothsayer <S%H7080><s%>, did the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> slay <S%H2026><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%> among the rest <S%H413><s%> of their slain <S%H2491><s%>.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> was the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and the border <S%H1366><s%> thereof <S%H5159><s%>. This was the inheritance of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, the cities <S%H5892><s%> and the villages thereof <S%H2691><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

And their border <S%H1366><s%> was Jazer <S%H3270><s%>, and all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, unto Aroer <S%H6177><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> Rabbah <S%H7237><s%>;
and from Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> unto Ramath-mizpeh <S%H7434><s%>, and Betonim <S%H993><s%>; and from Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%> unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%>;

and in the valley <S%H6010><s%>, Beth-haram <S%H1027><s%>, and Beth-nimrah <S%H1039><s%>, and Succoth <S%H5523><s%>, and Zaphon <S%H6829><s%>, the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> thereof <S%H7097><s%>, unto the uttermost part of the sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>.
This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, the cities <S%H5892><s%> and the villages thereof <S%H2691><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> inheritance unto the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>: and it was for the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

And their border <S%H1366><s%> was from Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%>, all Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, all the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, and all the towns <S%H2333><s%> of Jair <S%H2971><s%>, which are in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, threescore <S%H8346><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>:

and half <S%H2677><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%>, and Edrei <S%H154><s%>, the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4468><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, were for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, even for the half <S%H2677><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

These are the inheritances <S%H5157><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> distributed in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, eastward <S%H4217><s%>.

But unto the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> no inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, is their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, as he spake unto them <S%H1696><s%>.
